meanings.sent1: The treasure remained ungotten by the explorers.
meanings.sent2: The toy was left ungotten on the store shelf.
meanings.sent3: The elusive unicorn was ungotten by the hunters.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams of becoming a singer remained ungotten.
meanings.sent5: The key to his success was always ungotten.

meanings.sent1: The mythological creature was said to be ungotten by any living being.
meanings.sent2: The rare flower was believed to be ungotten in modern times.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a perpetual motion machine was ungotten by the inventor.
meanings.sent4: His artistic talent seemed ungotten, as if it came from another world.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious painting appeared ungotten, as if it materialized out of thin air.

meanings.sent1: The message was left ungotten by the intended recipient.
meanings.sent2: The prize remained ungotten by the contestants.
meanings.sent3: The secret code was ungotten by the spy.
meanings.sent4: The truth behind the legend was ungotten for centuries.
meanings.sent5: The answer to the riddle was always ungotten by the villagers.
